ConfigItem.Name: TicketOverview::Hooks
ConfigItem.Description: Define the hooks for the ticket overview. As keys the priorities are used - the lower the number the more important. The modules that implements the hooks are used as value.

ConfigItem.Name: Hook::Junk
ConfigItem.Description: Define the background color of junk tickets. (It has to be the html colors)

ConfigItem.Name: Hook::Queues
ConfigItem.Description: Define the background color of tickets based on queues. (It has to be the html colors)
